article_title: Officials Investigate Explicit Student Photos in Colorado ‘Sexting’ Case
article_text:
DENVER—Officials are investigating the apparent extensive practice of so-called sexting at a southern Colorado high school, where students have been suspended over the exchange of hundreds of explicit photos of those as young as eighth-graders.

Three mobile phones have been confiscated, and authorities said they are seeking search warrants to examine them. It is unclear how many students posed for the nude pictures, and the...

twitter.description: Officials investigating an apparently extensive case of so-called sexting at a southern Colorado high school are urging parents to check their children’s phones for explicit self photographs and talk to them about the risk of such photos becoming public.
twitter.title: Officials Investigate Explicit Student Photos in Colorado ‘Sexting’ Case

image.alt: Officials are investigating sexually explicit photos on mobile phones at a Colorado school
